Ingestion

Purpose

The ingestion process reads records from the BGS OGC API and writes them into a local SQLite archive.

Entry Point

The main function is:

build_master_database

It performs:

  • API pagination

  • Batch aggregation

  • Conversion to DataFrame

  • Schema alignment

  • SQLite insertion

  • Index creation

Schema Alignment

Before appending new batches, the module checks whether new columns exist in the API response.

If new fields are detected, missing columns are added using ALTER TABLE.

This prevents errors such as:

  • no column named shape

Derived Columns

The field year_clean is derived from the first four characters of the year column.
